description: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head. = /@ =
name: スクロ

description: A this Pokémon hides under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its shell while eating stored berries. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice. = /@ =
name: スクロ

description: Preferring dark, damp places, it spends the entire day eating fallen leaves that lie around it. = /@ =
name: スクリア
